dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing images of common objects in context, used for various computer vision tasks including image colorization.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:description: A dataset commonly used for image classification and object detection tasks, but not specifically referenced in the context of this paper.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC

dcterms:description: A large visual database designed for use in visual object recognition software research, but not specifically referenced in the context of this paper.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:description: Various datasets mentioned in the context of colorization but not specifically named or referenced.
dcterms:title: Other datasets
